items.sentence: I was surprised how difficult it was to do that.
I don\'t think Tom is going to be here tomorrow.
I don\'t think Tom knows how to ride a unicycle.
I don\'t think Tom knows very much about Boston.
I don\'t think Tom understood what I was saying.
I don\'t think Tom understood what was going on.
Tom is a couple of years older than me, I think.
Happiness isn\'t merely having many possessions.
Has Tom ever told you why he doesn\'t like Mary?
Tom said that there was a monster under his bed.
I haven\'t been able to get enough sleep lately.
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom comes.
Tom was sitting on the floor playing his bongos.
I didn\'t quite catch the name of that designer.
Tom dropped by Mary\'s home every day for lunch.
How much is Tom going to be paid for doing that?
How much money do you think Tom has in the bank?
How much money do you think that Tom has stolen?
We can go back home if you two want to be alone.
Why don\'t you believe me when I say I\'m happy?
